question: React me useEffect aur useLayoutEffect me kya difference hai?
answer: useEffect async hota hai, render ke baad run hota hai. useLayoutEffect sync hota hai aur render ke turant baad run hota hai.
code:
useEffect(() => { console.log('Runs after paint') }, []);
useLayoutEffect(() => { console.log('Runs before paint') }, []);

question: Virtual DOM kya hota hai?
answer: Virtual DOM ek in-memory representation hota hai real DOM ka, jo React updates ko optimize karta hai.
